content: For even more guides and tips on finding all the Gourd customisation items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, Awaken Wine Worm locations, and Luoija Fragrant Vine locations.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Old Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
For even more guides and tips on finding all the Gourd customisation items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, Awaken Wine Worm locations, and Luoija Fragrant Vine locations.
